app.controllers

Class ActionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.controllers.ActionController

  • public class ActionController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class takes in a command object, which specifies the details of the action to be carried out, and then interacts with the model through ModelManager to carry out the action. The data structure can then be extracted from this class by the CommandController.

      • ActionController

        public ActionController(ModelManager manager)
        Constructor for ActionController. It is called by CommandController. It is passed a ModelManager and set the ModelManager inside this class.
        Parameters:
        manager -

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public java.lang.String add(CommandObject commandObject)
        This method is used by CommandController to add a new TodoItem. It takes a CommandObject and check whether the CommandObject is valid. It calls UndoController to save the state for undo command. It then calls ModelManager to add a TodoItem based on the CommandObject.
        Parameters:
        commandObject -
        Returns:
        A feedback string to notify whether the method has carried out successfully.

      • display

        public java.lang.String display(CommandObject commandObject)
        This method is used by CommandController to change the display option of the current view. It takes a CommandObject and check whether the CommandObject is valid. It calls TaskController to select the display option depending on the CommandObject.
        Parameters:
        commandObject -
        Returns:
        A feedback string to notify whether the method has carried out successfully.

      • clear

        public java.lang.String clear(CommandObject commandObject)
        This method is used by CommandController to clear all TodoItem(s). It takes a CommandObject and check whether the CommandObject is valid. It calls UndoController to save the state for undo command. It then calls ModelManager to clear the TodoItem(s).
        Parameters:
        commandObject -
        Returns:
        A feedback string to notify whether the method has carried out successfully.

      • delete

        public java.lang.String delete(CommandObject commandObject,
                               java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> currentList)
        This method is used by CommandController to delete a TodoItem. It takes a CommandObject and check whether the CommandObject is valid. It also takes the current list of TodoItem to be able to delete the TodoItem from the current list. It calls UndoController to save the state for undo command. It then calls ModelManager to delete the TodoItem by a given index (from current list) retrieved from CommandObject.
        Parameters:
        commandObject -
        currentList -
        Returns:
        A feedback string to notify whether the method has carried out successfully.

      • sort

        public java.lang.String sort(CommandObject commandObject)
        This method is used by CommandController to sort the TodoItem(s). It takes a CommandObject and check whether the CommandObject is valid. It calls TaskController to sort the TodoItem(s) based on the option given by CommandObject.
        Parameters:
        commandObject -
        Returns:
        A feedback string to notify whether the method has carried out successfully.

      • search

        public java.lang.String search(CommandObject commandObject)
        This method is used by CommandController to search for a query. It takes a CommandObject and check whether the CommandObject is valid. Calls taskController to search for query, then updates resultList (which will be used by CommandController to show to view).
        Parameters:
        commandObject -
        Returns:
        A feedback string to notify whether the method has carried out successfully.

      • update

        public java.lang.String update(CommandObject commandObject,
                               java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> currentList)
        This method is used by CommandController to update a TodoItem. It takes a CommandObject and check whether the CommandObject is valid. It also takes the current list of TodoItem to be able to update the TodoItem from the current list. It calls UndoController to save the state for undo command. It calls ModelManager to update the TodoItem by a given index (from current list) and gets new data based on the CommandObject.
        Parameters:
        commandObject -
        currentList - The current data to be passed to display.
        Returns:
        A feedback string to notify whether the method has carried out successfully.

      • done

        public java.lang.String done(CommandObject commandObject,
                             java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> currentList)
        This method is used by CommandController to mark a TodoItem as done. It takes a CommandObject and check whether the CommandObject is valid. It also takes the current list of TodoItem to be able to update the TodoItem from the current list. It calls UndoController to save the state for undo command. It calls ModelManager to mark the TodoItem by a given index (from current list) as done.
        Parameters:
        commandObject -
        currentList -
        Returns:
        A feedback string to notify whether the method has carried out successfully.

It also takes the current list of TodoItem to be able to update the TodoItem from the current list. It calls UndoController to save the state for undo command. It calls ModelManager to mark the TodoItem by a given index (from current list) as undone.
        Parameters:
        commandObject -
        currentList -
        Returns:
        A feedback string to notify whether the method has carried out successfully.

        public java.lang.String changeSettings(java.lang.String filePath,
                                       java.lang.Boolean randomColorsEnabled,
                                       java.lang.Boolean notificationsEnabled)
        Calls modelManager to update with new settings.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The new file directory to be used
        randomColorsEnabled - The new setting for random color display
        notificationsEnabled - The new setting for notifications display
        Returns:
        The result string to be printed to the console
